0: The hotel itself was clean and the staff was friendly
The entire staff was astonishing and true professionals at their crafts
The staff were all pleasant and welcoming
Very comfortable room friendly and helpful staff great choice of breakfast
The lobby is welcoming and nice and the concierge is helpful
Hotel staff were extremely helpful and buffet breakfast very good with a great variety of food
Staff was always kind and helpful
1: Noticed that lots of flight crews stayed there which should be a good sign
The pub in the Hotel The Tavern is worth a visit as well as the staff is very welcoming and friendly and the prices are OKDue to the size of the Hotel the Lobby was sometimes a bit crowded and loud
Customer service is useless and there is no way of stopping this parking session
Twice there was a problem where hotel staff thought that I still needed to pay whereas I had paid on boking awkward

The windows internally were dust and dirty all of the drains bath and sink were either so old they could not cope with the water flow or were so blocked a dribble of water caused them to flood over the swing out mirror was practically falling ofNext onto the service not once did we have a polite friendly or even marginally approachable person waiting on any of the tables we sat at on the three days we were here
We approached reception regarding the room size and noise
Dining in the tavern we were served a steak and ale pie at £ 1450 plus 125 service charge that had a pitta bread balanced on top instead of the puff pastry lid
This is n’t something I could tell the desk agent about for them to fix as they have already “ fixed ” it by putting a metal plate of the broken latch mechanism so there is nothing to latch onto
